article_title: WHO describes Gaza hospitals as 'like a horror movie'
sentence: In  al-Ahli  hospital  in  Gaza  City,  which  the  WHO  visited  during  the  week-long  truce,  the  team  reported  patients  with  “the  most  horrific  injuries”  lying  on  floors  “running  with  blood”,  while  the  bodies  of  those  who  had  been  killed  were  lined  up  in  the  car  park  outside.
